segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, taking cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to collapse under the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how messy this kitchen is getting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the floor if it keeps going like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should really turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to get in trouble if she catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why no one is reacting to any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like no one is paying attention to what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
